item.title: Neovim setup by NvChad in 2023
item.description:
NvChad

NvChad, hosted by siduck1, is an impressive neovim enhancement suite designed to provide a seamless experience without the need for complex configurations.2

It proudly boasts a Blazing fast Neovim config providing solid defaults and a beautiful UI and it lives up to this claim. I have personally used my own custom3 neovim and lunarvim setups, both of which are fast, but none can match the sheer beauty of NvChad.
